name: 李旻璁
objective:
This course introduces the fundamentals of computer programming. Students will learn the basic components of computer language through exercises during class time. 

The goals of this course is to help students feel confident of their ability to map scientific problems into computational framework, design mathematical algorithms, write and debug programs for specific tasks. We will use Fortran compiler to learn Fortran – the language which has a long relation with scientific computing in Chemical Engineering.
schedule:
(01) Class introduction, installation of WSL platform
(02) Basic bash commands in Ubuntu
(03) vim editor
(04) the structure of the program, compile and execute a program
(05) I/O
(06) Math operators and functions
(07) Do loop
(08) If and logic control
(09) array
(10) file
(11) subroutine and module
(12) Numerical methods
(12) Numerical methods
(13) Numerical methods
(13-18) Course project and Python
scorePolicy:
# English – Except for the 1st class, everyone need to use English for any kind of communication.
# Problem-based learning – The class is student-centered. Everyone need to come to class on time and participate the class discussions.  
# Grading – Class participation (+60), class exercises (+40) 
# Networking – everyone should prepare their NTUT Google account. The lectures and everything you have done will be documented in our YouTube channel.
materials: The learning materials will be available online.
